Title: Majutsushi Orphen Hagure Tabi: Kimluck-hen
Description: ['Second season of Majutsushi Orphen Hagure Tabi. Orphen, who now knows Azalie\'s true motive, heads to the holy city of Kimluck. However, a fierce battle with the "Death Teacher" awaits him.']
